ldmx::Producer

ldmx::Producer Class Reference

Base class for a module which produces a data product. More...

#include <EventProcessor.h>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

 Producer (const std::string &name, Process &process)
virtual void produce (Event &event)=0

Detailed Description

Base class for a module which produces a data product.

Note:
This class processes a mutable copy of the event so that it can add data to it.

Definition at line 138 of file EventProcessor.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

ldmx::Producer::Producer ( const std::string &  name,
Process &  process 
)

Constant used to track EventProcessor types by the EventProcessorFactory Class constructor.

Parameters:
name Name for this instance of the class.
process The Process class associated with EventProcessor, provided by the framework
Note:
Derived classes must have a constructor of the same interface, which is the only constructor which will be called by the framework
The provided name should not be the class name, but rather a logical label for this instance of the class, as more than one copy of a given class can be loaded into a Process with different parameters. Names should not include whitespace or special characters.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void ldmx::Producer::produce ( Event &  event  )  [pure virtual]

Process the event and put new data products into it.

Parameters:
event The Event to process.

Implemented in ldmx::EcalDigiProducer, ldmx::EcalVetoProcessor, ldmx::FindableTrackProcessor, ldmx::HcalDigiProducer, ldmx::HcalVetoProcessor, ldmx::PnWeightProcessor, ldmx::TriggerProcessor, and ldmx::DummyProducer.
